description: The Tardiva Hydrangea tree form is an amazing sight in summer gardens. Popular for its full size and majestic silhouette, the Tardiva Hydrangea is an eye-catching plant with large conical clusters of silvery white buds, followed by airy white flowers in late summer. Its shrub-like form makes it an excellent option for garden borders and privacy screens. Plus, the blooms are stunning when backed by a summer sky surrounded by lush green foliage. The flowers are also attractive to pollinators, making it a lovely addition to any garden.
